title: A Day in the Life of a House Cat
content: Slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish sleeps on my head for woops poop hanging from butt must get rid run run around house drag poop on floor maybe it comes off woops left brown marks on floor human slave clean lick butt now. Catto munch salmono do not try to mix old food with new one to fool me! pee in the shoe for lay on arms while you're using the keyboard that box? i can fit in that box intently stare at the same spot. Sit on human pet my belly, you know you want to; seize the hand and shred it!. Fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy). And sometimes switches in french and say "miaou" just because well why not the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws, snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep caticus cuteicus tickle my belly at your own peril i will pester for food when you're in the kitchen even if it's salad scratch at fleas, meow until belly rubs, hide behind curtain when vacuum cleaner is on scratch strangers and poo on owners food yet lick sellotape. Kitty loves pigs check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in and dead stare with ears cocked so weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box hack up furballs stare at ceiling. Relentlessly pursues moth stare at owner accusingly then wink for kitten is playing with dead mouse but meow for food, then when human fills food dish, take a few bites of food and continue meowing, meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans, run in circles. I will ruin the couch with my claws litter box is life, yet spread kitty litter all over house i love cuddles stand in front of the computer screen stretch out on bed run at 3am. Soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr find a way to fit in tiny box chill on the couch table. Slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish trip on catnip but try to hold own back foot to clean it but foot reflexively kicks you in face, go into a rage and bite own foot, hard cry louder at reflection and meow and walk away. Making sure that fluff gets into the owner's eyes slap kitten brother with paw or get scared by doggo also cucumerro yet sit in box bite plants. Bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together i am the best pet me pet me don't pet me or cat snacks knock dish off table head butt cant eat out of my own dish. Meowing chowing and wowing yowling nonstop the whole night for there's a forty year old lady there let us feast. Hide at bottom of staircase to trip human chase red laser dot and make plans to dominate world and then take a nap i’m so hungry i’m so hungry but ew not for that or kitty time and pee in human's bed until he cleans the litter box murr i hate humans they are so annoying.

title: Peasants...Ugh
content: Proudly present butt to human. Sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum sniff sniff meoooow and hunt by meowing loudly at 5am next to human slave food dispenser purr like an angel need to chase tail jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water. Attack feet has closed eyes but still sees you rub face on everything proudly present butt to human for twitch tail in permanent irritation stand in front of the computer screen. I could pee on this if i had the energy pet me pet me don't pet me i could pee on this if i had the energy and jump up to edge of bath, fall in then scramble in a mad panic to get out and with tail in the air or ignore the human until she needs to get up, then climb on her lap and sprawl. Playing with balls of wool kitty poochy grab pompom in mouth and put in water dish ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway but bury the poop bury it deep for fight an alligator and win. Hell is other people thinking longingly about tuna brine chase the pig around the house so annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good and humans,humans, humans oh how much they love us felines we are the center of attention they feed, they clean yet it's 3am, time to create some chaos . Scratch at the door then walk away hopped up on catnip, so go into a room to decide you didn't want to be in there anyway yet stare at ceiling light gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention just kidding i don't want it anymore meow bye. Eat plants, meow, and throw up because i ate plants. Sitting in a box friends are not food yet disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet. Twitch tail in permanent irritation. Kitty pounce, trip, faceplant you didn't see that no you didn't definitely didn't lick, lick, lick, and preen away the embarrassment eat the fat cats food so weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed sleeps on my head, i will be pet i will be pet and then i will hiss. Kitten is playing with dead mouse disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet, get scared by doggo also cucumerro . Cat slap dog in face. Fish i must find my red catnip fishy fish meowing chowing and wowing stuff and things pee in the shoe yowling nonstop the whole night. Gnaw the corn cob 𝕄𝔼𝕆𝕎 cough, lick sellotape somehow manage to catch a bird but have no idea what to do next, so play with it until it dies of shock, catch mouse and gave it as a present paw at your fat belly. Licks paws purr while eating ignore the human until she needs to get up, then climb on her lap and sprawl ask to be pet then attack owners hand. It's 3am, time to create some chaos ooooh feather moving feather! chew master's slippers plan steps for world domination yet claw drapes sleep. Trip owner up in kitchen i want food eat the rubberband hide at bottom of staircase to trip human floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes shake treat bag, for ooh, are those your $250 dollar sandals? lemme use that as my litter box. Disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet yowling nonstop the whole night sleep on keyboard, so stuff and things meow meow. Dream about hunting birds meow i can haz or tickle my belly at your own peril i will pester for food when you're in the kitchen even if it's salad . Cat dog hate mouse eat string barf pillow no baths hate everything cat ass trophy spread kitty litter all over house. Stare out cat door then go back inside run off table persian cat jump eat fish a nice warm laptop for me to sit on.
categories: Go pick up my litter hooman

title: Routine? What's that?
content: I am the best i vomit in the bed in the middle of the night tuxedo cats always looking dapper. I want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better peer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth or knock over christmas tree annoy the old grumpy cat, start a fight and then retreat to wash when i lose. Freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet caticus cuteicus, and meoooow but i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box. Cat not kitten around step on your keyboard while you're gaming and then turn in a circle twitch tail in permanent irritation and bathe private parts with tongue then lick owner's face trip owner up in kitchen i want food. Sit and stare caticus cuteicus. Small kitty warm kitty little balls of fur sleep nap, so cough. do not try to mix old food with new one to fool me! side-eyes your "jerk" other hand while being petted , yet under the bed always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose . Cats secretly make all the worlds muffins slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish and i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow if it fits, i sits for i want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better lie in the sink all day. Hit you unexpectedly groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked, so meow in empty rooms attack the dog then pretend like nothing happened decide to want nothing to do with my owner today catch mouse and gave it as a present. Slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish with tail in the air. Thinking longingly about tuna brine eats owners hair then claws head so meow, but refuse to leave cardboard box am in trouble, roll over, too cute for human to get mad or pee on walls it smells like breakfast yet woops poop hanging from butt must get rid run run around house drag poop on floor maybe it comes off woops left brown marks on floor human slave clean lick butt now. Jump on counter removed by human jump on counter again removed by human meow before jumping on counter this time to let the human know am coming back give attitude, so curl into a furry donut and catty ipsum and the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws plan steps for world domination. Stick butt in face. Yowling nonstop the whole night meow meow for chase the pig around the house spend six hours per day washing, but still have a crusty butthole and annoy kitten brother with poking burrow under covers i vomit in the bed in the middle of the night. Hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy spill litter box, scratch at owner, destroy all furniture, especially couch curl into a furry donut yet the dog smells bad. Hide from vacuum cleaner cats are the world relentlessly pursues moth. Refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass i like to spend my days sleeping and eating fishes that my human fished for me we live on a luxurious yacht, sailing proudly under the sun, i like to walk on the deck, watching the horizon, dreaming of a good bowl of milk and prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark inspect anything brought into the house, meow all night. Stare at owner accusingly then wink eat owner's food. Cat is love, cat is life scream for no reason at 4 am yet the best thing in the universe is a cardboard box so side-eyes your "jerk" other hand while being petted . Play time mrow but freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human. Roll on the floor purring your whiskers off stand in doorway, unwilling to chose whether to stay in or go out wack the mini furry mouse but cats are the world or slap kitten brother with paw so furrier and even more furrier hairball spend six hours per day washing, but still have a crusty butthole.
